eventDate.subject: HRX.eventDate
eventDate.description: Date when the transaction event occurred.
eventDate.title: Date

eventHandler.subject: HRX.eventHandler
eventHandler.description: Name of the person who handled the transaction event.
eventHandler.title: Handler

eventNotes.subject: HRX.eventNotes
eventNotes.description: More information about the transactions event. You can e.g. list the specimens included in the event in this field.
eventNotes.title: Notes

eventType.subject: HRX.eventType
eventType.description: Type of the transaction event. Return for e.g. partial returns and addition e.g. for when more specimens are added to the transaction later.
eventType.title: Event type
